ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | nffun.1 | |- F/_ x F |
| 2 |  | #P_df-fun | |- ( Fun F <-> ( Rel F /\ ( F o. `' F ) C_ _I ) ) |
| 3 | 1 | #P_nfrel | |- F/ x Rel F |
| 4 | 1 | #P_nfcnv | |- F/_ x `' F |
| 5 | 1, 4 | #P_nfco | |- F/_ x ( F o. `' F ) |
| 6 |  | #P_nfcv | |- F/_ x _I |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_nfss | |- F/ x ( F o. `' F ) C_ _I |
| 8 | 3, 7 | #P_nfan | |- F/ x ( Rel F /\ ( F o. `' F ) C_ _I ) |
| 9 | 2, 8 | #P_nfxfr | |- F/ x Fun F |
